address.addrLine: Department of Near and Middle Eastern Collections

msItem.title: Tract on the Names of God from alif to yāʼ
Prayers and incantations for alleviating various ailments and misfortunes
Names of the nineteen Bābī months
Talismans and letters including two addressed by Ṣubḥ-i Azal to "Bāqir the enemy"
Answer to fourteen questions propounded by M. Nicolas
Commentary on the Sūrat al-Ḥamd or Fātiḥah
Copy of a letter written by the Head Custodian of Qum to Mīrzā Mūsá on the Baḥāʼi-Azalī controversy
Two letters from Kirmān to Shaykh Muḥammad Mahdī, the latter of which includes several verses
Photograph of Ṣubḥ-i Azal autograph of a passage mentioned in one of the letters
Browne's translation of the account of the death of Ṣubḥ-i Azhal followed by a list of twenty of his works
History of the Bābī insurrection at Zanjān

listBibl.bibl: See sub classmark BBA. 5 in Browne's "Catalogue and Description of 27 Bābī Manuscripts (Continuation)", in Journal of the Royal Asiatic Society of Great Britain and Ireland (Oct., 1892): 637-710.

msItem.title: List of the descendants of Mīrzā Buzurg

recordHist.source: "Manuscript description based on. R. A. Nicholson: A descriptive catalogue of the Oriental MSS belonging to the late E.G. Browne. Cambridge, 1932. ", abbreviated by the OCIMCO project team.

availability.p: Entry to read in the Library is permitted only on presentation of a valid reader's card for admissions procedures contact Cambridge University Library Admissions). Contact near_eastern@lib.cam.ac.uk for further information on the availability of this manuscript
